resources.string:
Welcome to Bible lexicon Bible study application.

Do not hesitate to contact me at {email} if you need help or have some questions.

Using for a first time

Follow these steps to start using this app:

  1. Download some modules (youtube tutorial)
    • Open application\'s menu (click on upper-left app\'s icon)
    • Select module downloader
    • Now select group of modules you want to download. Please, also use filter to narrow the listing
  2. Now you are ready to use the application. Continue with:
    • Module library: library of all downloaded modules (here you can open lexicons and Bibles)
    • Study tools: this group of tools comes useful if you want to study things more deeply
    • Tools: tools to enrich your app\'s usage

For a further guide, please see help, which addresses things more specifically.
